chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
orig_multi_params: MultiParams orig_base_params
orig_failure_params: FailureParams orig_multi_params
orig_name_overlay_params: NameOverlayParams orig_multi_params
orig_fail_msg_params: FailMsgParams orig_multi_params
orig_new_msg_params: NewMsgParams orig_multi_params
orig_msg_serializer: Serializer msg

Goal:
forall (net : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))), step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init (failed, deserialize_odnet net) tr

Premises:
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Record NewMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NewMsgParams { msg_new : msg } Arguments NewMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_NewMsgParams [P0]
Record NameOverlayParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NameOverlayParams { adjacent_to : Relation_Definitions.relation name; adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y}; adjacent_to_symmetric : RelationClasses.Symmetric adjacent_to; adjacent_to_irreflexive : RelationClasses.Irreflexive adjacent_to } Arguments NameOverlayParams {P0} Arguments Build_NameOverlayParams [P0] _ [adjacent_to] _%function_scope
Record FailMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailMsgParams { msg_fail : msg } Arguments FailMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailMsgParams [P0]
Record FailureParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailureParams { reboot : data -> data } Arguments FailureParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailureParams [P0] _ _%function_scope
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope (_ _)%function_scope [nodes]%list_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _ _)%function
msg = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in msg : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments msg {P MultiParams}
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) => ([], step_ordered_dynamic_init) : forall (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P), list name * ordered_dynamic_network Arguments step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init {P multi_params}
Record Serializer (A : Type) : Type := Build_Serializer { serialize : A -> IOStreamWriter.t; deserialize : ByteListReader.t A; serialize_deserialize_id : serialize_deserialize_id_spec serialize deserialize } Arguments Serializer _%type_scope Arguments Build_Serializer [A]%type_scope _%function_scope [deserialize] _%function_scope
Record ordered_dynamic_network (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkODNetwork { odnwNodes : list name; odnwPackets : name -> name -> list msg; odnwState : name -> option data } Arguments ordered_dynamic_network {P multi_params} Arguments mkODNetwork {P multi_params} _%list_scope (_ _)%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (new_msg_params : NewMsgParams multi_params) (fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams multi_params) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_ordered_dynamic_failure : forall (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P), NameOverlayParams multi_params -> NewMsgParams multi_params -> FailMsgParams multi_params -> step_relation (list name * ordered_dynamic_network) (name * (input + output)) Arguments step_ordered_dynamic_failure_star {P multi_params overlay_params new_msg_params fail_msg_params}
deserialize_odnet = fun net : ordered_dynamic_network => {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := fun src dst : name => filterMap (fun m : IOStreamWriter.wire => match deserialize_top deserialize m with | Some data => Some data | None => None end) (odnwPackets net src dst); odnwState := odnwState net |} : ordered_dynamic_network -> ordered_dynamic_network

Inductive step_ordered_dynamic_failure (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (new_msg_params : NewMsgParams multi_params) (fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams multi_params) : step_relation (list name * ordered_dynamic_network) (name * (input + output)) := StepOrderedDynamicFailure_start : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h...
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') []) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_ordered_dynamic_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list name * ordered_dynamic_network -> list (name * (input + output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (h : name), ~ In h (odnwNodes net) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := h :: odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate_ls name_eq_dec (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))) (collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) (map2snd msg_new (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed (odnwNodes net))))) h msg_new; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some (init_handlers h)) |} -> P (failed, net) (failed, net') []) ->...-> P p p0 l
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> In h (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net h = Some d -> input_handlers h inp d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (odnwPackets net) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) h (Some d') |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr
step_failure_pt_mapped_simulation_1 : forall (net net' : network) (failed failed' : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + list output))), step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') tr -> step_failure (map tot_map_name failed, pt_map_net net) (map tot_map_name failed', pt_map_net net') (filterMap pt_map_trace_occ tr) \/ pt_map_net net' = pt_map_net net /\ failed = failed' /\ filterMap trace_non_empty_out (filterMap pt_map_trace_occ tr) = []
step_ordered_failure_sind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_ordered_failure_ind : forall P : list name * ordered_network -> list name * ordered_network -> list (name * (input + output)) ->...-> P p p0 l
Inductive step_ordered_failure (P : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams P) (overlay_params : NameOverlayParams multi_params) (fail_msg_params : FailMsgParams multi_params) : step_relation (list name * ordered_network) (name * (input + output)) := StepOrderedFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), onwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> ~ In to failed -> net_handlers to from m (onwState net to) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (onwPackets net) from to ms) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net)...
StepOrderedFailure_input : forall (h : name) (net net' : ordered_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (out : list output) (inp : input) (d : data) (l : list (name * msg)), ~ In h failed -> input_handlers h inp (onwState net h) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| onwPackets := collate name_eq_dec h (onwPackets net) l; onwState := update name_eq_dec (onwState net) h d |} -> tr = (h, inl inp) :: map2fst h (map inr out) -> step_ordered_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr
StepOrderedDynamicFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : ordered_dynamic_network) (failed : list name) (tr : list (name * (input + output))) (m : msg) (ms : list msg) (out : list output) (d d' : data) (l : list (name * msg)) (from to : name), ~ In to failed -> In to (odnwNodes net) -> odnwState net to = Some d -> odnwPackets net from to = m :: ms -> net_handlers to from m d = (out, d', l) -> net' = {| odnwNodes := odnwNodes net; odnwPackets := collate name_eq_dec to (update2 name_eq_dec (odnwPackets net) from to ms) l; odnwState := update name_eq_dec (odnwState net) to (Some d') |} -> tr = map2fst to (map inr out) -> step_ordered_dynamic_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') tr

```coq
intros net failed tr H. remember step_ordered_dynamic_failure_init as H_init. induction H; subst; eauto.
Qed`
```
